languages.text: Кипа бумаг с доносами — за пайковый талон люди охотно сообщают властям о проступках соседей, знакомых и даже родственников.

traits.locale_text: Кипа бумаг с доносами — за пайковый талон люди охотно сообщают властям о проступках соседей, знакомых и даже родственников.

languages.text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.
languages.original_text: Кипа бумаг с доносами — за пайковый талон люди охотно сообщают властям о проступках соседей, знакомых и даже родственников.

traits.locale_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.
A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

languages.text: Una pila de papeles con denuncias: la gente informaba de los delitos de sus vecinos, contactos e incluso familiares al personal de seguridad a cambio de tarjetas de racionamiento.
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Una pila de papeles con denuncias: la gente informaba de los delitos de sus vecinos, contactos e incluso familiares al personal de seguridad a cambio de tarjetas de racionamiento.

languages.text: 糾弾文が書かれた書類の山が置かれている。配給カードと引き換えに、人々は進んで隣人や知人、さらには親戚までもの悪行を執行官に報告する。
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 糾弾文が書かれた書類の山が置かれている。配給カードと引き換えに、人々は進んで隣人や知人、さらには親戚までもの悪行を執行官に報告する。

languages.text: 堆积如山的举报文件。为了得到配给卡，人们纷纷向执法者举报邻居、熟人的违法行为，就连自己的亲人都不放过。
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 堆积如山的举报文件。为了得到配给卡，人们纷纷向执法者举报邻居、熟人的违法行为，就连自己的亲人都不放过。

languages.text: Ein Stapel Papier voller Denunziationen ... im Tausch gegen eine Rationenkarte melden die Leute den Enforcern bereitwillig die Verfehlungen ihrer Nachbarn, Mitarbeiter und Verwandten.
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Ein Stapel Papier voller Denunziationen ... im Tausch gegen eine Rationenkarte melden die Leute den Enforcern bereitwillig die Verfehlungen ihrer Nachbarn, Mitarbeiter und Verwandten.

languages.text: Un tas de papiers, majoritairement des dénonciations ; contre un ticket de rationnement, les gens n'hésitent pas à dénoncer des voisins, des connaissances, voire des membres de leur propre famille aux prévôts.
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Un tas de papiers, majoritairement des dénonciations ; contre un ticket de rationnement, les gens n'hésitent pas à dénoncer des voisins, des connaissances, voire des membres de leur propre famille aux prévôts.

languages.text: Kınama yazılarını içeren bir kâğıt yığını. İnsanlar; kumanya kartı karşılığında komşularının, tanıdıklarının ve hatta akrabalarının kabahatlerini infazcılara memnuniyetle raporluyor.
languages.original_text: A pile of papers containing denunciations — in exchange for a ration card, people willingly report the misdeeds of their neighbours, acquaintances, and even relatives to the enforcers.
